addDetails.title: Details
addDetails.body: Please add some details for the following issues:
addDetails.startDate: When did these issues start to happen?

complaintLetter.title: Mail an Official Letter of Complaint
complaintLetter.bodyText: This Letter of Complaint uses the repair issues from the checklist and the details you've added.
complaintLetter.bodyTextBold: Make sure to send this letter as certified mail so you can prove that your landlord has received it!
complaintLetter.accessDateTitle: Provide a few apartment access dates for when repairs can be made.
complaintLetter.successTitle: Your Letter of Complaint has been created and can be viewed here:
complaintLetter.successBody: This PDF will always available on your Case History page, so you can come back to it later on. Donâ€™t forget to send it via certified mail!

listActions.title: Take Action
listActions.headerDescription: Here are some actions you can take to build out your case.
listActions.empty: There's nothing to do at the moment, apologies. Check out what is on Your Case?
